questiontext.p: Write ONE WORD ONLY for each answer.
• Local jobs can be found in the warehouses.
• Buy the newspaper to get one free magazine (Job Plus).
• Feel stress and spend a lot of time looking for jobs.
• Advisable to go to an agency instead of the recruitment seminar.
• Intend to take the art course.
• Fill out a feedback form at the end of the course.

generalfeedback.text: Please fill in the blanks with the correct answers.

questiontext.p: Choose the correct letter, A, B or C.
11 The reason why David is replacing Jane is that
12 According to the speaker, what is the problem for the museum currently?
13 Why were the thieves able to successfully steal the statue?

ol.li: A. The security device is outdated.
B. The security guard is not well-trained.
C. They knew what they were searching for.

questiontext.p: 14 In order to improve security, they are going to

ol.li: A. get more closed-circuit television cameras.

questiontext.p: 15 What kind of librarian are they looking for?

generalfeedback.text: Please select the correct answer for each question.
